segments.text: Do you think children watch too much Tv ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I only allow my child to watch up to an hour a day . I don ’ t think that tv is bad for kids . I think that kids should be active and not become couch potatoes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Perhaps I should impose a limit on how much Tv my kids can watch . They don ’ t do much else in their free time . At least they always do their homework first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you decide to put a limit on the amount of tv they can watch , remember to have something else for them to do . If you don ’ t , they ’ ll get bored and misbehave .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They could go out and play with their friends .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . You could talk to other parents in your neighbourhood and plan it so that all the kids are free at the same time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Perhaps I could ask my husband to teach them foot ball or some thing . He watches too much Tv too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s a good idea . Remember that if the parents watch too much Tv , the kids will probably follow suit .
segments.speaker: S2
